EmailTemplate.name: CCR 23.1 Apply for SE Core roles
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS with the Challenge comes to Berkshire and Buckinghamshire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Roles in our new Reading office!
If you have loved working on NCS with The Challenge in a seasonal role, or even if you missed out, then think about working for us all year round!
We are contacting you as we believe you may be interested in working full time in our new Reading office.
We are currently looking for core staff to work across all areas of our team. These include:
Recruitment Specialist (Staffing Associate) - play a part in recruiting the 3500 members of seasonal staff who shape the NCS programme for 2015.
NCS Sales Coordinator - build relationships with schools in order to sign up young people for the summer of their lives! Assistant Programme Manager - set up and deliver the NCS programme.
All our year-round roles are advertised at www.the-challenge.org/year-round-roles. Please go to the role that is of interest, and apply to the appropriate contact.
Many thanks for all your interest in NCS with The Challenge.
Best wishes,
NCS with The Challenge CCR 23.1
